name: Loot the Fortress
description:
Loot the Fortress is a game of percentages. Anytime you go to rob the fortress, there's a chance your bag breaks - either 1 in 5 for a burlap bag, or 1 in 16 for a leather bag. Make sure you have a plan in place for when your bags break!

You win when you buy the crown from the shop - clearly you've gotten rich quick (or at least, you've gotten rich).
